INSP_MESSAGES.TEXT: To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal.
INSP_MESSAGES.AUTHOR: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

INSP_MESSAGES.TEXT: People who are unable to motivate themselves must be content with mediocrity, no matter how impressive their other talents.
INSP_MESSAGES.AUTHOR: Andrew Carnegie

INSP_MESSAGES.TEXT: Most people do not really want freedom, because freedom involves responsibility, and most people are frightened of responsibility.
INSP_MESSAGES.AUTHOR: Sigmund Freud

INSP_MESSAGES.TEXT: The transfer of power is always a test of the constitutional system, a test of its strength.
INSP_MESSAGES.AUTHOR: Vladimir Putin

INSP_MESSAGES.TEXT: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
INSP_MESSAGES.AUTHOR: Abraham Lincoln

INSP_MESSAGES.TEXT: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
INSP_MESSAGES.AUTHOR: Theodore Roosevelt

INSP_MESSAGES.TEXT: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
INSP_MESSAGES.AUTHOR: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
